  • Constructor Details

    • Cinema

      public Cinema(int cinemaNum, String cinemaCode, CinemaType cinemaType)
      Constructor of the Cinema object. Once called, a new Cinema Object will be created.
      Parameters:
      cinemaNum - represents the number of the Cinema object within the cineplex.
      cinemaCode - represents the unique code of the Cinema Object.
      cinemaType - represents the type of cinema of the Cinema Object.

      Prints Showing list of available showings when method is called.

    • searchShow

      public Showing searchShow(int searchIndex)
      Returns Showing object corresponding to the Search Index requested.
      Parameters:
      searchIndex - represents the Search Index requested.
      Returns:
      Showing.

    • addShow

      public void addShow(Movie movie, LocalDateTime showTime, DayType dayType)
      Adds a new Showing object to the Showing List.
      Parameters:
      movie - represents the Movie object for which this Showing corresponds to.
      showTime - represents the show time for which this Showing corresponds to.
      dayType - represents the type of day for which this Showing corresponds to.

    • removeShow

      public void removeShow(Showing show)
      Removes a Showing from the Showing List.
      Parameters:
      show - represents the Showing object to be removed.

    • removeMovieShowings

      public void removeMovieShowings(Movie movie)
      Removes a Showing which has the mentioned Movie object.
      Parameters:
      movie - represents the Movie object to identify which Showing to remove.
